data.title: Great Food
data.text: Love their tenderloins, pizzas are very good, service is great the staff is very friendly, lots of seating for groups or couples, great bar seating

data.title: Outstanding Quality
data.text: Great bar and grill with unbelievably fresh bar food.  I know sounds odd but everything that is made tastes freshly prepared, not microwaved or pre-frozen.  Great selection of drinks, tons of TVs and an awesome staff!

data.title: Delicious pizza
data.text: Great pizza. Loved the taste! Interesting location. Got take out twice but never dined in. Seems to have good nightly specials.

data.title: Good sports bar with great food!
data.text: Great place to go for dinner and drinks. And of course Sports. Plenty of room for customers, including separate rooms. They have delicious fresh pizza and the best spinach and artichoke dip. Service was very good even on a busy night. Nice beer specials and food specials during the week.

data.title: Average Food, Great Server
data.text: Being from the home town of the original OP I finally decided to take some co-workers to the OP in OP. Didn't realize it was an Iowa Hawkeye/Kansas Jayhawk bar. I looked all around for an Iowa State flag or picture. When I asked the bartender why they didn't have any Iowa State stuff on the walls since they were from Iowa. She just looked at me and mumbled something. When I asked our server she told me to go to the OP in Olathe it was more of an Iowa State bar. I thanked her and told her I wouldn't be back to this place.

data.title: Be sure to ask the right questions!
data.text: We reserved their "Red Room" for a class reunion and apparently we didn't ask enough questions.  Upon reserving the location they asked how many people we were anticipating and we said 100+. Well, they double booked the room for the night of our event. Upon arriving, the other group took all the tables and left us with only one table. The bartender pulled another table in from outside but that didn't help. The music was so loud that it was hard to talk. At around 8:30ish we must have been reaching the occupancy limit because they opened the garage door. With it being 90-95 degrees outside that didn't help. Then to top things off, a DJ starting setting up and starting blasting music around 10:00pm. A lot of our guests had had enough with overcrowding, heat and then the blasting music.  The upsetting thing was I had just been in there the day before to confirm things and never once did the manager mention the double booking or DJ. I wish we would have known this information before hand so we could have moved our event. I will say that the bartender tried hard to please us, she needs to be commended for handling a uneasy situation well.

data.title: College Sports Fans this is the Place
data.text: Wonderful place to sit and have a snack and beer while you watch the game.  If KU, KSU, MU, ISU, or Iowa are on get there early to get a table!  It originated in Iowa so you will see a lot of Iowa fans here.

data.title: Great pizza and cold beer
data.text: Been here a hundred times.  Figured it was time to review.    A big loud sportsbar.    Pizza is good.   Sauce is unique.   Crust is cracker like.  House special is our fav.   Service was probably lacking.    a bit slow.   beers are decent price and cold.   Lots of TV.   good place to watch sports.

data.title: NEVER DISAPPOINTS
data.text: We stop here every time we are in KC and the pizza never fails to be the best around!  Had great service and could watch the Iowa game any place in the bar/restaurant.  YUM, YUM, YUM!

data.title: Great Local Place
data.text: We had a Christmas Party in the back room, and had a great time.  The service was excellent and the food was very good for bar food.  Great hang out place.

owner_response.author: Chrissy G, Manager at The Other Place, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Janet - It's so wonderful to hear that you & the entire Christmas party had such a great time! We appreciate you letting us know how we did :)  Hope you come back to visit soon. Sincerely, Chrissy.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The Most Delicious Chicken Fingers & an Amazing Amount of Flat Screens
data.text: Met our friends here on Friday for Happy Hour. There were 7 of us, 4 adults and 3 kiddos. We got to enjoy Happy Hour without feeling uncomfortable with the kids. There are seriously like 30 flat screens in the place, a game area and windows on both sides of the building so plenty to keep anyone from getting bored. They offer great food & drink specials. The Chicken Fingers were seriously some of the Best I've ever had. The other food was good too: spinach artichoke dip, cheesy bread sticks, a Cajun Chicken Cobb Salad and the kids had pizza. Our server was attentive & fun. The check was less than I expected. We all had a great time. We'll definitely be going back!

data.title: Above average sports bar with food well above most bar standards.
data.text: Very friendly place, good selection of beers and food - pizza obviously their specialty. The back door opens to the Farmers' Market, so there is ample parking - a real plus for the area. There are nice shops in this Old Town area if you are there during the day.

owner_response.author: Chrissy G, Owner at The Other Place, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for taking the time to post a review about us. We're very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your experience here at The OP. Your kind words are truly appreciated! Please come back & see us again soon. Sincerely, Chrissy.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Average is good
data.text: The food is average bar food but we have our favorites.  It is to noisy for my taste buy my spouse does not mind.  We enjoy playing NTN or Buzztime trivia and that makes it one of our picks.  Try the Blowfish Twist drink!

owner_response.author: Chrissy G, General Manager at The Other Place, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to review us! Playing NTN & Buzztime trivia is addicting isn't it? At The Other Place, we take reviews very seriously and would like to know what we could improve upon regarding the food. Please email us at theotherplacemarketing@gmail.com with any suggestions that might make your dining experience at The "OP" better. Sincerely, Chrissy.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Pretty Nice Place
data.text: The selection of beers/alcohol is above average for most bars and the food/selection is awesome. It's a great low-key place to hang with your friends.

owner_response.author: , Owner at The Other Place, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for the kind words Jenny! They are appreciated! We hope to see you & all your friends soon! Sincerely, Chrissy.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great wings, under cooked pizza
data.text: Tons of TV's, service was fast and friendly. The wings were great, large pieces heavy on the sauce, refills came very fast. Only complaint was the pizza was a little under cooked, slightly doughy. Other than that was a great little local spot in there downtown area.

owner_response.author: Chrissy G, Public Relations Manager at The Other Place, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. Your compliments on the wings, atmosphere and service is much appreciated! We are very sorry that your pizza was undercooked. This should never happen and we are addressing that concern with our kitchen staff. We hope you’ll stop in again sometime and give us another try! Sincerely, Chrissy.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wow, great pizza
data.text: I was suprised to find this to be some of the best pizza I have had in Kansas City.  The subs are great as well. It seems to have a hundred different TVs all on sports.  If you like pizza, beer, and sports this has to be the best place in town.

data.title: My favorite local bar and grill. I've never had a bad thing on the menu,
data.text: My favorite local bar and grill. I've never had a bad thing on the menu,
